sentence.Network_en: Hunting is usually initiated by hunger and stopped by satiation.
sentence.Network_cn: 追逐现象通常是由饥饿所引起的,并由于饱食而停止.

sentence.Network_en: If so, satiation is said to exist.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果这样, 则可以认为存在着餍足情况.

sentence.Network_en: SATIATION - Numbs them out, they feel nurtured by the numbing experience.
sentence.Network_cn: 满足感-自我麻木, 他们希望生活在麻木中.

satiation 饱和satiation effect 满足效应satiety 餍足状态

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being satisfactorily full and unable to take on more
2. the act of achieving full gratification

auth_sentence.content: Relief from pain is even more rewarding than satiation, which would explain why addiction never leads to satiation.
